author: Ashley Moliere
title: City of Victoria allows camping in parks so homeless can physically distance
description: With the increase of homeless people camping along Pandora Avenue in downtown Victoria, the city is now allowing the homeless to sleep in tents in city parks as a temporary measure so they can physically distance from others.
content:
The City of Victoria won't be enforcing rules on camping in parks, as part of an effort to let people experiencing homelessness follow instructions to physicially distance themselves from others during the COVID-19 pandemic.
